data.description:
Create sprawling, brilliant worlds and explore them with your friends! Invite your friends to an online game, then race to the finish with hang-gliders, or switch to climbing mode for even more fun.

Discover thousands of amazing creations in the interactive gallery then remix them however you want! When you're happy with your creation, you can upload to the SculptrVR content gallery and let others see the incredible things you've made.
 
Unleash your creativity by building with SculptrVR’s intuitive and fun creation tools. Then destroy it all with rockets!
 
Add mind-boggling detail with SculptrVR's voxel tech and 10,000X zoom.

Export everything you’ve made to FBX or OBJ  for 3D printing or sharing online!

Procedurally generate landscapes, then delve underground, but be careful not to delve too deep!

There’s a million ways to have fun in SculptrVR and in your world, anything is possible.

---
For tips, tutorial videos and support visit https://www.sculptrvr.com/.

New build 3.87 from May 31st 2022

3.81 - Significant Update:
New Features:
1. New Tutorial System
2. New tips and video tips system
3. New glide tool
4. New Home Menu
5. New Options to like sculptures/avatars
6. New options to delete sculptures/avatars
7. New Screenshot previews for sculptures and heads
8. New sculpture categorization abilities
9. New sculpture database on the backend
10. New VR Keyboards to name sculptures/avatars
11. New default images

Optimizations:
1. Optimization on the tutorial start video
2. Optimizations on saving the sculpture flow
3. Optimizations on create/editing avatars
4. Optimizations on tool panels
5. Optimizations on sessions
6. Optimizations on avatar/sculptures creation flow
7. Optimizations on sculpture upload capabilities

Fixes:
1. Fixed issue oriented towards multiplayer sessions have wrong LODs on avatars
2. Fixed issues related to sessions, including failed session join, session search and
session create
3. Fix issues related to broken avatar thumbnail
Includes updates to the analytics system, and the codebase includes some tutorial features that aren't enabled in this version.
Analytics update
Bugfix on a "Host Session" button

New intro video for new users!
Changes to the Online Gallery, including making it more family-friendly.

Update SculptrVR to take advantage of the better processing on Quest 2. On Quest 2 SculptrVR renders at a much higher resolution, and displays 30% more triangles. In 90hz mode, SculptrVR should automatically reduce the triangle count to maintain framerate.

Also fix an input bug with the linear motion tools.

Turn off all analytics since I never used them, and I'm too lazy to make a privacy policy for them.
